ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone will work on GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
3G-enabled touchscreen phone in blue with 8.1-megapixel camera and 720p HD video capture
Compatible with AT&T; Mobile Music, and AT&T; Navigator GPS turn-by-turn directions
Wi-Fi networking; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD expansion to 32 GB; multitasking thanks to Symbian OS
Up to 5.6 hours of talk time, up to 329 hours (13.7 days) of standby time; released in September, 2010
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson Vivaz U5a Unlocked Phone with Symbian, 8.1 MP Camera, HD Video, Wi-Fi and GPS - U.S. Version - Blue
